Articles.Content:
so recently i have been watching some vids and people have made stuff like STOCK PROPELLOR PLANE OR STOCK HELICOPTER

And i was wondering how they made the parts moved

please comment if you know it would mean so much to me

From what I've seen it generally involves using landing gear as bearings and fuel tanks as an axle.  The craft is built with a decoupler or docking port that connects the two sections that are then disconnected once deployed to the launch pad/runway.
